title: My brother got his friend to play ranked on his account to get him to gold...
body:
And he still has the perfect bronze mentality lel

3/0 Zed, yelling at the screen, "ha you're so bad. this voli's bad. get good kid"
Voli starts camping mid because he's pushing the fuck out of his lane
"omfg this fucking noc needs to learn how to play ffs im getting camped and what does noc do? fuck around in bot learn to play dumbass kid"

EDIT: Side note, he's 21.
